params.name: observerOrNext
params.description:
(optional) Either an observer with methods to be called,
 or the first of three possible handlers, which is the handler for each value emitted from the subscribed
 Observable.

params.name: error
params.description:
(optional) A handler for a terminal event resulting from an error. If no error handler is provided,
 the error will be thrown as unhandled.

params.name: complete
params.description: (optional) A handler for a terminal event resulting from successful completion.

return.description: a subscription reference to the registered handlers

content: # RxTask
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "rxtask",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "main": "dist/cjs/index.js",
  "types": "dist/cjs/typings/index.d.ts",
  "esm": "dist/esm/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run build:all",
    "build:all": "npm run build:cjs & npm run build:esm",
    "build:cjs": "tsc --declaration --sourceMap -p tsconfig/tsconfig.cjs.json",
    "build:esm": "tsc --declaration --sourceMap -p tsconfig/tsconfig.esm.json",
    "build:esm:docs": "tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.esm.json",
    "build:test": "tsc -p tsconfig/tsconfig.test.json",
    "docs": "npm run docs:build",
    "docs:build": "npm run clean && npm run build:esm:docs && npm run build:test && esdoc",
    "docs:publish": "./publish-docs.sh",
    "clean": "rimraf dist tmp",
    "test": "istanbul cover -e .ts -x '*.test.ts' _mocha -- 'test/**/*.test.ts' --require ts-node/register --require test/setup.ts"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "tslib": "^1.9.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/mocha": "^5.0.0",
    "@types/node": "^9.6.4",
    "@types/sinon": "^4.3.1",
    "@types/sinon-chai": "^2.7.29",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "istanbul": "^1.1.0-alpha.1",
    "mocha": "^5.1.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.2",
    "rxjs": "^5.5.10",
    "rxjs-marbles": "^2.4.1",
    "sinon": "^4.5.0",
    "sinon-chai": "^3.0.0",
    "ts-node": "^6.0.0",
    "typescript": "^2.8.1"
  }
}
